subject: Re: [junit] junit is not working after install
msgSnippet: What do you get from the command: java -version ? -jn- ... -- Programming is the art of writing essays in crystal clear prose and making them execute. - Per
messageBody:
What do you get from the command:

java -version

?

-jn-

On Jan 1, 2008 4:37 PM, wahoo.java <wahoo.java@...> wrote:
>
>
>
>
>
>
> I am new to junit. I downloaded zip file and cannot get the
> command: java -cp junit.jar junit,swingui.TestRunner
>
> I am following instructions from boob "Agile Java development"
> by Anil Hemrajani as is on page 70.
>
> I set the classpath accordingly and I get java command not recognized.
>
> I cannot proceed in book because I cannot get the sample test to work.
>
>

Programming is the art of writing essays in crystal clear prose and
making them execute. - Per Brinch Hansen
